data.name: Animal Avatar Maker for VRChat Vroid VRM and Cluster
data.detailed_description:
Zoo Studio just helps you to make your own 3D animal avatars easily.
The avatars generated would be used in VRM compatible softwares such as VMagicMirror.
Remember to config blendshape clips in Unity by importing the VRM generated

You would also upload it to VRchat by importing the VRM into Unity. Further tutorial is provided in the software.


Some of the avatars are locked. You would unlock them by following the guides inside the software.

Features supported:
Shape tuning
Clothes and accessories changing system
Brush and sticker painting

data.short_description: Zoo Studio justs help you to make your own animal avatars easily. It would be used in VRchat and VRM compatible software.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 64 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400/AMD Ryzen 5 2600X or better
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 128 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS Catalina
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Storage: 128 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS Catalina
  • Memory: 2028 MB RAM
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
